Header: Religious programmes at the historic Mihinthalaya sacred area to mark the passing away of Arhat Mihindu Thero
Content: The series of religious programmes were conducted at the historic Mihinthalaya sacred area for six days recalling the passing away of Arhat Mihindu Thero. The Final programme was held today under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe. Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe who arrived at the Mihinthalaya sacred place took part in religious practices. An alms giving was offered to 1,500 Buddhist monks. Ministers Gamini Jayawickrema Perera and P. Harrison were present on the occasion.
